RecipeDef.Name: CAN_CannibalSimpleMeal
RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal simple meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from human meat.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_CannibalFineMeal
RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal fine meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a somewhat complex cannibal meal from a combination of human meat and organic ingredients.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_CannibalLavishMeal
RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal lavish meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a very complex cannibal meal from a combination of human meat and organic ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_CannibalSurvivalMeal
RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal packaged survival meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a packaged survival cannibal meal from a combination of human meat and organic ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_MakeCannibalPemmican
RecipeDef.label: Make cannibal pemmican
RecipeDef.description: Make cannibal pemmican, a preserved combination of human meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_MakeCannibalKibble
RecipeDef.label: make cannibal kibble
RecipeDef.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw human and plants.

RecipeDef.description: Cook 4 straightforward cannibal meals from human meat.

RecipeDef.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex cannibal meals from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients.

RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal lavish meal x4
RecipeDef.description: Cook 4 very complex cannibal meals from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.Name: CAN_CookCannibalMealSurvivalBulk
RecipeDef.label: cook cannibal packaged survival meal x4
RecipeDef.description: Prepare 4 packaged survival cannibal meals from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.

RecipeDef.label: Make cannibal pemmican x4
RecipeDef.description: Make bulk cannibal pemmican, a preserved combination of human meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.

RecipeDef.label: make espresso coffee
RecipeDef.description: Make a warm, bitter beverage usually complemented with milk and sugar. A favorite among students and office workers across the galaxy due to high caffeine content and pleasing aroma. Brewing coffee in a espresso machine is generally much faster.

RecipeDef.label: reheat iced coffee
RecipeDef.description: This espresso machine has a small built-in grill to reheat iced coffee.

RecipeDef.label: brew latte coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a potent espresso mixed with fresh milk to help ease bitterness before pouring and serving. Lattes have a reputation of being particularly meant for “sophisticated” individuals.

RecipeDef.label: brew mocha coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a coffee mixed with sweet and luxurious chocolate. Those of snobbish persuasion would argue mocha is more of a dessert than an actual coffee drink.

RecipeDef.label: brew irish coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a drink made with whiskey and coffee blended thoroughly before forming a head and being topped with a spoonful of whipped cream. Perfect for those who just got out of bed and are already wanting to go back to it.

RecipeDef.label: brew cannibal coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a drink... for a very particular... refined coffee drinker.

RecipeDef.label: make fast tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a pleasing, aromatic beverage prepared by steeping a bag of tea leaves in boiling water. Brewing tea in this specially prepared espresso machine is generally much faster.

RecipeDef.label: make black tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a particularly bitter tea cut with creamy milk, wakes one up a bit and relaxes one's mind.

RecipeDef.label: make yuenyeung
RecipeDef.description: Make a mixture of coffee and tea. Tea and coffee drinkers respectively set their differences aside while concocting this unholy amalgamation. Whether it’s served hot or cold it’s equally confusing to the imbiber.

RecipeDef.label: make kombucha tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a sugary tea left out to ferment, after fermenting the end product is a sweet and sour, sometimes even naturally fizzy drink known as kombucha. Praised for health benefits, though some remain skeptical.

RecipeDef.label: brew mint coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a bitter espresso mixed with cream or milk, then further mixed with mint oil and garnished. Cool and velvety coffee gives way to an even cooler, soothing aftertaste, not to mention great smelling breath.

RecipeDef.label: brew dalgona coffee
RecipeDef.description: Brew a trendy, newer drink in the world of coffee rumored to originate from far off steamworlds. Coffee granules are rapidly mixed with sugar to form a thick, luxuriously sweet foam. Afterwards the foam is dispersed over deeply chilled milk before drinking.

RecipeDef.label: make green tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a light, citrusy green tea spiked with sugar to create a buttery, almost nutty flavor.

RecipeDef.label: make mint tea
RecipeDef.description: Make black tea leaves mixed with mint leaves and deeply steeped, then garnished with additional mint leaves. Leaves your breath surprisingly fresh.

RecipeDef.label: make masala chai
RecipeDef.description: Make a musty, warm, almost woody tea crafted by simple leaves and complex spices. Alleged to be good against high cholesterol.

RecipeDef.label: make noon chai
RecipeDef.description: Make an ancient Kashmiri tea mixing tea leaves, a pinch of salt and baking soda, which results in an striking pink beverage that is famous for being not only delicious but also healthy for the body. Very efficient for treating those with a high blood pressure.

RecipeDef.label: brew espresso romano
RecipeDef.description: Brew an already acidic coffee garnished with a wedge of more acidic lemon, meant to be juiced into the coffee before quickly consumed while hot. An acquired taste to be sure but lauded by those who do prefer it.

RecipeDef.label: mix lemonade
RecipeDef.description: Squeeze a few lemons, mix the juice with water and add some sugar.

RecipeDef.label: make lemon tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a dark tea cut with water, chilled and garnished with a wedge of bright lemon.

RecipeDef.label: make earl grey tea
RecipeDef.description: Make a very strong and semi-sweet fruity tea. Floral notes dance around one's pallet at even the most dull scent. People who finish the drink feel strangely urged to colonize.

RecipeDef.label: prepare simple stew
RecipeDef.description: Prepare a simple uncooked stew quickly made from a few ingredients.

RecipeDef.label: prepare fine stew
RecipeDef.description: Prepare a fine uncooked stew assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.

RecipeDef.label: prepare lavish stew
RecipeDef.description: Prepare a lavish uncooked stew. A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this stew nourishes the body, mind, and soul.

RecipeDef.label: cook randy burger
RecipeDef.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.

RecipeDef.label: cook randy burger x4
RecipeDef.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.
